name: Garena

task.description: Installing the garena (WARNING: Don't login, close the window)
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup: http://cdn.gxx.garenanow.com/gxx/pc/installer/Garena-v2.0.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Garena/Garena/Garena.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Installing the garena (WARNING: Don''t login, close the window)'
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
